Class Bootstraps

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.type.Bootstraps
public final class Bootstraps extends Object
Bootstrap methods for invokedynamic situations.
Author:
Laird Nelson

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static final TypeVariable<?>
    getTypeVariable(GenericDeclaration gd, String name)
    Returns a TypeVariable with a name equal to the supplied name and that is declared by the supplied GenericDeclaration, or null if there is no such TypeVariable.

  • Method Details

    • getTypeVariable

      public static final TypeVariable<?> getTypeVariable(GenericDeclaration gd, String name)
      Returns a TypeVariable with a name equal to the supplied name and that is declared by the supplied GenericDeclaration, or null if there is no such TypeVariable.
      Parameters:
      gd - the GenericDeclaration in question; may be null in which case null will be returned
      name - the name in question; may be null in which case null will be returned
      Returns:
      a TypeVariable with a name equal to the supplied name and that is declared by the supplied GenericDeclaration, or null
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Nullability:
      This method may return null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
